txt.en: You saw the silhouette of what appears to be an enormous boar nearby and should approach with caution.
Found the trail of the rumoured boar
The Once and Future King-slayer
DNT - Investigate for proof of the rumoured Great boar

'I would normally not concern myself with rumours, but this one weighs heavily upon my mind. There is tell of a monstrous boar wandering the woods. I cannot help but think of the Boar of Everholt, which defeated Folca King all those years ago.\n\n'I do not have the time to chase rumours, but I would appreciate if you could look into this for me. Such a beast would be a dangerous thing. Let us hope that these are simply rumours....'

'I must admit that I am relieved it was not a great boar. I was raised learning the bravery of Folca King, and I confess that if the Boar of Everholt was able to best one of Rohan's greatest warriors, I feared for myself and others.\n\n'However, the fact that this totem was meant to frighten us is a little concerning. With the crude construction, it is possible some children made it as a jest. Let us hope that is the truth of it.'
Continue to follow the trail of the great boar
Follow the trail of the great boar deeper into the woods
Search for evidence of the great boar
DNT - Continuing to follow the trail of the rumoured Great boar
Arcil is concerned about the rumours of a great boar wandering the woods, the likes of that which defeated King Folca long ago.
DNT - Continued to follow the trail of the rumoured Great boar
Arcil is in the Mead Hall of Aldburg, west of the woods.\n\nYou should return to Arcil and let him know what you found in the woods.
The boar was last rumoured to be in the wooded hills to the east of Aldburg.\n\nArcil has asked that you follow the tales of a great boar, not unlike the Boar of Everholt, to see if it truly exists.
It was not an enormous boar, but this totem was made to appear as such
The trail of the rumoured boar leads up the hill, to the south.
DNT - Continue to follow the trail of the rumoured Great boar
DNT - Continue to follow the trail of the rumoured Great boar
Talk to Arcil
The trail continues east into the woods.\n\nYou should follow the trail of the great boar.
Find the trail of the rumoured boar
The trail continues south into the woods.\n\nYou should follow the trail of the great boar.
DNT - You see the silhouette of what appears to be an enormous boar. \n\nApproach with caution to investigate further.
DNT - The rumours were just that, rumours.
DNT - Continuing to follow the trail of the rumoured Great boar
You see the silhouette of what appears to be an enormous boar
